#ifndef _GV_MFTime_
#define _GV_MFTime_
/******************************************************************************
@doc

@module GvMFTime.h - VRML MFTime field|

Copyright (c) 1997 - 1998 by blaxxun interactive - Holger Grahn

Notes:

#include <gvsubfield.h>

class GvMFTime : public GvMField 
#ifdef _COM
        ,public CComDualImpl<EventInMFTime, &IID_EventInMFTime, &LIBID_GLViewVrmlLib>
        ,public CComDualImpl<EventOutMFTime, &IID_EventOutMFTime, &LIBID_GLViewVrmlLib>
#endif


{

    GV_MFIELD_HEADER(GvMFTime,double,1);

  public:

        double *values;
    

        operator double*() { return(values); }

        static GvFieldClass getClassFieldType() { return (MFTIME); }
        GvFieldClass getFieldType() const { return (MFTIME); }
        GvFieldClass getSFFieldType() const { return (SFTIME); }


    void set1(int index, double value);
    const double  *get() const { return values; }


        double get1(int i) const { 
                                if (Length() == 0) { return(0.0); }
                                if (i>=num) i = num-1; return(values[i]); 
                        }

        int io1Value(AStream &a, int index);
        int get1(GvString &value, int index);
        int set1(const char* value, int index);

    int set(double val);

        int set(const Array<double> &a) { return set(a.Length(),a.Data()); }
        
        GvField* get1Field(int index);


    //GvBool operator==(const GvMFTime &f) const { return(value == f.value); }

    void Interpolate (double *result, const double *A, double ta, const double *B,double tb) { *result = (*A * ta+ *B *tb); }

    // Interpolate cnt values result = A * ta + B * tb
    void Interpolate (double *result, const double *A, double ta, const double *B,double tb, int cnt) 
    { 
        while (cnt >0 ) {
            Interpolate(result,A,ta,B,tb);
            result ++; A++; B++; cnt--;
        }
    }

#ifdef _COM
        BEGIN_COM_MAP(GvMFTime)
                COM_INTERFACE_ENTRY(EventInMFTime)
                COM_INTERFACE_ENTRY(EventOutMFTime)
                COM_INTERFACE_ENTRY_CHAIN(GvField)
        END_COM_MAP()

        DECLARE_NOT_AGGREGATABLE(GvMFTime)

        COM_DEFAULT_SFIELD_METHODS()

    /* EventIn methods */
    STDMETHOD(setValue)(int cnt,double *newValue) 
        { 
                        if (cnt != getNum()) makeRoom(cnt);
                        memcpy(values,newValue,cnt*1*sizeof(double));
                        setDefault(FALSE);
                        OnChanged();
                        return S_OK; 
        }

    STDMETHOD(set1Value)(int index,double newValue) 
        { 
                        if (index >=getNum()) makeRoom(index+1);
                        set1(index,newValue); 
                        return S_OK; 
        }

        /* EventOut methods */ 
    STDMETHOD(getSize)(int *cnt) { *cnt = getNum();  return S_OK; }
        STDMETHOD(getValue)(int cnt,double *v) 
        { 
                                if (cnt > getNum()) cnt = getNum();
                                memcpy(v,get(),cnt*1*sizeof(double)); 
                                return S_OK;  
        }
        STDMETHOD(get1Value)(int index,double *v) 
        { 
                                if (index >=getNum()) return S_FALSE;
                                *v = values[index]; 
                                return S_OK;  
        }


#endif



};

#endif /*_GV_MFTime_ */
Generated at Thu Jan 27 18:48:40 2000 for blaxxunContact3D by 1.0.0 written by Dimitri van Heesch, © 1997-1999
